output_text: {"id":"spec-audit-3step-plan","steps":[{"name":"Scope & completeness check","ok":true,"reason":"Confirm the document defines goals, non-goals, stakeholders, assumptions, constraints, dependencies, and out-of-scope items; flag missing sections and ambiguous ownership."},{"name":"Consistency & testability review","ok":true,"reason":"Verify requirements are unambiguous, internally consistent, and measurable; ensure each requirement has acceptance criteria, clear terminology, and no conflicting statements across sections."},{"name":"Risk, feasibility & traceability audit","ok":true,"reason":"Assess technical feasibility, security/privacy/compliance impacts, performance/scalability targets, and operational considerations; create a traceability matrix linking requirements to designs, tests, and risks with prioritized follow-ups."}],"final":"Use the three steps to identify gaps, remove ambiguity, ensure testable requirements, and produce a prioritized issue list with owners and traceability to risks and validation artifacts."}
